src:
Superstjärnornas bästa vän i Sverige
Thomas Johansson är lika ung som Stephen King, världens mest produktive författare. Att passera 70-årsstrecket innebär bara att yrkesskickligheten ökar och att man kan jobba effektivare.
02 Nov 2019, 11:30 by Jan Gradvall

text:
The superstar's best friend in Sweden
Thomas Johansson is as young as Stephen King, the world's most prolific writer. Passing the 70-year mark only means that professional skills increase and that you can work more efficiently.
02 Nov 2019, 11:30 by Jan Gradvall
